chunk_text: Article 2 This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union. Done at Strasbourg, 29 April 2015. For the European Parliament The President M. SCHULZ For the Council The President Z. KALNIÃ A-LUKAÃ EVICA (1) OJ L 347, 20.12.2013, p. 855. (2) OJ C 373, 20.12.2013, p. 1. (3) Regulation (EC) No 546/2009 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 June 2009 amending Regulation (EC) No 1927/2006 on establishing the European Globalisation Adjustment Fund (OJ L 167, 29.6.2009, p. 26). (4) Council Regulation (EU, Euratom) No 1311/2013 of 2 December 2013 laying down the multiannual financial framework for the years 2014-2020 (OJ L 347, 20.12.2013, p. 884).
